files.help:
Supported since _v3.2_ (Partial support since _v3.1_).

You can move the file to _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/tmux/tmux.conf_.

Set this in your tmux.conf:

```set-environment -g TMUX_PLUGIN_MANAGER_PATH '~/.local/share/tmux/plugins'```

Then update the path to tpm to:

```run '~/.local/share/tmux/plugins/tpm/tpm'```

Now move .tmux to _XDG_CONFIG_HOME_/tmux.
